_MODE: FSD - Full Self-Driving AI Mode (Tesla-style autonomous trading)
_DESCRIPTION: AI has full autonomy with only 2 hard constraints: max_capital and time_limit

fsd._HARD_CONSTRAINTS: These 2 constraints CANNOT be violated by the AI
fsd._max_capital_note: HARD CONSTRAINT: AI cannot deploy more than this amount
fsd._time_limit_note: HARD CONSTRAINT: AI must trade within 5-minute bars (30s, 1min, 5min, 30min, etc.)
fsd._AI_LEARNING_PARAMETERS: AI learns and adjusts these automatically
fsd._MARKET_SCANNER: AI scans stocks and picks opportunities

_symbols_note: Initial stock universe for AI to choose from (AI can learn which to trade)

broker._ibkr_note: Uses IBKR Trader Workstation (TWS) for live data and execution

_USAGE._note: FSD Mode runs completely autonomously - AI makes ALL decisions
_USAGE._note2: AI will trade for 60 minutes, learning from every trade, then save state for next session

_FSD_vs_BOT._BOT_MODE: All parameters are HARD constraints (supervised/headless autopilot)
_FSD_vs_BOT._FSD_MODE: Only max_capital and time_limit are hard constraints, AI decides everything else
_FSD_vs_BOT._LEARNING: FSD learns from EVERY trade (good or bad), BOT follows fixed rules
